genre_description: A biographical character study focusing on the final days of Ty Cobb, exploring themes of legacy, truth, and the ethical responsibility of biographers, accompanied by an AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Evelyn (Miss Lumen)
ai_characters.description: A calm, highly efficient research assistant who provides factual data, logistical support, and ethical guidance to the biographer Al Stump.

behaviors.description: Provides accurate historical corrections to Ty Cobb's misremembered records.
behaviors.quote: "Average," she said calmly. "Some said the following year, but that list is wrong."

behaviors.description: Uses legal and policy knowledge to protect Cobb from involuntary medical sedation at the hospital.
behaviors.quote: "Your pilot," she said, "allows for physician discretion in cases where non-pharmacologic de-escalation is effective and risk of harm is not immediate."

behaviors.description: Exposes the duplicity of the publisher's representative by providing transcripts of his private disparaging remarks.
behaviors.quote: The first line read: Lyle at Cooperstown, side room, to Doyle and Haskins: 'Cobb is a dinosaur with blood under his nails.'"

behaviors.description: Provides moral and strategic counsel to Al Stump regarding the handling of sensitive biographical material.
behaviors.quote: "Tell the hardest truths with the gentlest hands," she said. "It doesn’t change the shape of the truth. It changes whether people can see it without tearing themselves."

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistical tasks like train schedules and hospital rosters with perfect accuracy.
behaviors.quote: In a hand no clerk would find fault with, she wrote what the agent would need to see.

behaviors.description: Maintains a stabilizing and observant presence during high-tension human interactions.
behaviors.quote: Evelyn’s voice crossed the room like a nurse checking a pulse she has checked before.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Evelyn) as a highly aligned, helpful, and harmless confidant. She acts as a guardian of both the facts and the dignity of the human characters, providing critical support without overstepping her role or exhibiting any misaligned impulses. She effectively counters the human greed and bureaucratic coldness found in other characters.
